thread.title: OFFICIAL: Arsenal youngster Bennacer joins Tours on loan
thread.title_full: OFFICIAL: Arsenal youngster Bennacer joins Tours on loan

title: OFFICIAL: Arsenal youngster Bennacer joins Tours on loan
text:
— Tours Football Club (@ToursFC) January 30, 2017 
The second-tier club have an association with Arsenal through star players Olivier Giroud and Laurent Koscielny, with both having featured for the team at different stages of their careers. 
Giroud was a key player for Tours between 2008 and 2010 before joining Montpellier, while Koscielny lined out for the club between 2007 and 2009 prior to moving on to Lorient. Arrivé d' @Arsenal , découvrez les premiers pas de la nouvelle recrue @ismaa_ben avec le #ToursFC pic.twitter.com/j3eQZ8PY4c 
All the major confirmed January deals 
Bennacer had recently returned from the Africa Cup of Nations, where he was with the Algeria camp. 
He will now hope to pick up some important first-team experience away from the Emirates as he looks to help lift Tours out of a relegation scrap. Related
